components.name: Amazon Route 53
components.description: DNS service that directs traffic to the application.

components.name: Elastic Load Balancer
components.description: Distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets to prevent server overload.

components.name: Auto Scaling Group
components.description: Automatically adjusts the number of web and app servers based on demand.

components.name: Amazon RDS
components.description: Managed relational database service for structured data storage.

components.name: Amazon S3 Bucket
components.description: Stores static assets like images and videos.

data_flows.description: User requests are directed to the Elastic Load Balancer via Route 53.
The load balancer distributes requests to web servers within the Auto Scaling Group.
Web servers communicate with Amazon RDS to retrieve structured data.
Web servers serve static content from the Amazon S3 Bucket.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between external users and the application infrastructure.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary protecting data storage and database access.
